ECDSAVerify(address,bytes32,bytes32,uint.details: Validate the ECDSA parameters of signed message ECDSA public key associated with the specified Ethereum address

params._publicKeyX: X parameter of uncompressed ECDSA public key
params._publicKeyY: Y parameter of uncompressed ECDSA public key

returns._0: Boolean on if the signature is valid

ValidateSignature(bytes32,uint8,bytes32,.details: Validate ECSDA signature was signed by the specified address

returns._0: Boolean on if the signature is valid

calculateAddressString(address,bool).details: calculates the address string representation of the signed address.

params._includeAddrChecksum: bool. should the addressChecksum be used for this caluclation.

createClaimMessage(address,bool).details: returns the hash for the provided claim target address.

params._claimAddrChecksum: bool target address was signed using the Ethereum checksum (EIP-55)
params._claimToAddr: address target address for the claim.

returns._0: bytes32 Bitcoin hash of the claim message.

createClaimMessageDMD(address,bool).details: returns the hash for the provided claim target address.

params._claimAddrChecksum: bool target address was signed using the Ethereum checksum (EIP-55)
params._claimToAddr: address target address for the claim.

returns._0: bytes32 Diamond hash of the claim message.

dilute1().details: dilutes the entitlement after a certain time passed away and sends it to the beneficor (reinsert pot)

returns._0: amount of DMD that got send to the beneficor.

dilute2().details: dilutes the entitlement after a certain time passed away and sends it to the beneficor (reinsert pot)

returns._0: amount of DMD that got send to the beneficor.

dilute3().details: dilutes the entitlement after a certain time passed away and sends it to the beneficor (reinsert pot)

returns._0: amount of DMD that got send to the beneficor.

getEthAddressFromSignature(address,bool,.details: returns the ethereum pseude address of a DMD signed message.

params._claimAddrChecksum: bool target address was signed using the Ethereum checksum (EIP-55)
params._claimToAddr: address target address for the claim.
params._r: bytes32 r component of the signature.
params._s: bytes32 s component of the signautre.
params._v: uint8 v component of the signature.

returns._0: address DMD pseudo address of the signer. (what would be the address if the same Private Key would have been used on an DMDv3 than in DMDv4)

getHashForClaimMessage(address,bool).details: returns the hash for the provided claim target address.

params._claimAddrChecksum: bool target address was signed using the Ethereum checksum (EIP-55)
params._claimToAddr: address target address for the claim.

returns._0: bytes32 DMD style hash of the claim message.

pubKeyToEthAddress(bytes32,bytes32).details: PUBLIC FACING: Derive an Ethereum address from an ECDSA public key

params.pubKeyX: First  half of uncompressed ECDSA public key
params.pubKeyY: Second half of uncompressed ECDSA public key

publicKeyToBitcoinAddress(bytes32,bytes3.details: returns the essential part of a Bitcoin-style address associated with an ECDSA public key

params._addressType: Whether DMD is Legacy or Segwit address and if it was compressed
params._publicKeyX: X coordinate of the ECDSA public key
params._publicKeyY: Y coordinate of the ECDSA public key

returns._0: Raw parts of the Bitcoin Style address

publicKeyToEthereumAddress(bytes32,bytes.details: Convert an uncompressed ECDSA public key into an Ethereum address

params._publicKeyX: X parameter of uncompressed ECDSA public key
params._publicKeyY: Y parameter of uncompressed ECDSA public key

returns._0: Ethereum address generated from the ECDSA public key
